game.name: 带不动的七年一班 No Kids Left
game.shortDescription: A story of "Venomous" Long Xiaoyun, carrying a diary of regrets, time travel to the early 21st century, as a playboy who "rides on the experience for studying abroad." With a group of "strangely shaped" volunteer teachers, leads a bunch of "rowdy" left-behind children to chase their dreams.
